WorkItem.Description:
I get an installer error as follows:
Could not access network location \\[shared]\[user]\\Visual Studio 2010\AddIns.

I'm pretty sure it's due to the extra backslash. Please help, I have a default installation of Visual Studio 2010 Professional.

Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: Installer Error - Could not access network location

Comments.Message: Fixed it myself using InstEd, searched for PersonalFolder, and removed the backslash after [PersonalFolder], then saved a new msi file. I also had to change the install location, otherwise Chirpy threw an exception when starting Visual Studio.
Thanks for posting this. I was looking for ages for a solution to this.
